name: Evoker Qualities
description: Summoning and conjuration qualities for all Digimon

qualities.name: CONJURER
qualities.description:
Incompatible: **SUMMONER**

Upon taking this Quality, the Digimon gains a new resource, known as **Creation Limit**. Its total **Creation Limit** is equal to its **BIT** + **Stage**. It uses this **Creation Limit** when conjuring objects.

The Digimon can take the **Conjure Objects Action**, which is 2 **Actions**. The **Conjure Objects Action** allows the user to conjure objects to any **Space** within the Digimon's **Range**, taking up 1 cubic **Space**. The total cubic **Spaces** of objects you can conjure cannot bypass your **Creation Limit**.

Conjured Objects can serve as cover that blocks terrain or block pathways. Objects are destroyed when hit with an **Attack** that deals **Damage**. If any Objects are destroyed, the cost of creating them is removed from your **Creation Limit**.

The user cannot take the **Conjure Objects Action** for 1 **Round** after it's been used.

qualities.name: SUMMONER: INFANTRY
qualities.description:
Incompatible: **CONJURER**

Upon taking this Quality, the Digimon gains a new resource, known as **Creation Limit**. Its total **Creation Limit** is equal to its **BIT** + **Stage**. It uses this **Creation Limit** when summoning Minions.

The Digimon can take the **Summon Minions Action**, which is 2 **Actions**.

**Infantry Minions** have a **Creation Cost** of 4, can take 2 damaging **Attacks** before destruction, are **Medium Size**, and have **Movement** gains a bonus equal to the Summoner's **Stage**.

**Unique Benefit**: The Minions can be controlled as 1 **Action**, but only **once per turn**.

qualities.name: SUMMONER: PROTECTOR
qualities.description:
Incompatible: **CONJURER**

Upon taking this Quality, the Digimon gains a new resource, known as **Creation Limit**. Its total **Creation Limit** is equal to its **BIT** + **Stage**. It uses this **Creation Limit** when summoning Minions.

The Digimon can take the **Summon Minions Action**, which is 2 **Actions**.

**Protector Minions** have a **Creation Cost** of 4, can take 3 damaging **Attacks** before destruction, are **Large Size**, and have **Movement** gains a bonus equal to the Summoner's **Stage**.

**Unique Benefit**: A Minion can now **Intercede**, using the Summoner's **Actions**.

qualities.name: SUMMONER: RECON
qualities.description:
Incompatible: **CONJURER**

Upon taking this Quality, the Digimon gains a new resource, known as **Creation Limit**. Its total **Creation Limit** is equal to its **BIT** + **Stage**. It uses this **Creation Limit** when summoning Minions.

The Digimon can take the **Summon Minions Action**, which is 2 **Actions**.

**Recon Minions** have a **Creation Cost** of 2, can take 1 damaging **Attack** before destruction, are **Small Size**, and have **ACC** gains a bonus equal to the Summoner's **Stage**.

**Unique Benefit**: The Minions can now make **[RANGE]** Attacks, using the Summoner's **Range** and **Effective Limit**.

qualities.name: SUMMONER: VOLATILE
qualities.description:
Incompatible: **CONJURER**

Upon taking this Quality, the Digimon gains a new resource, known as **Creation Limit**. Its total **Creation Limit** is equal to its **BIT** + **Stage**. It uses this **Creation Limit** when summoning Minions.

The Digimon can take the **Summon Minions Action**, which is 2 **Actions**.

**Volatile Minions** have a **Creation Cost** of 1, can take 1 damaging **Attack** before destruction, are **Small Size**, and have **DAM** gains a bonus equal to the Summoner's **Stage**.

**Unique Benefit**: A Minion now explodes when it is destroyed, making a **[MELEE] [DAMAGE] [T:BURST]** Attack against every Target within the Area.

qualities.name: EVOKER
qualities.description:
**REQUIREMENT: CONJURER OR SUMMONER**

The Digimon is now capable of taking both **Summoner** and **Conjurer**, and can now take the **Conjure Objects** and **Summon Minions Action** as the same 2 **Actions**.

However, the Digimon's **Creation Limit** is shared between Summoned Minions and Conjured Objects.
